h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Weaver's Needle Location
content: The Weaver's Needle Vessel can be found during The Duskveil fight at the end of the Purple Cloud Mountain secret area in The Webbed Hollow. During the fight, the Blood Stained Needle, which you obtain from Zhu Bajie") (a mandatory boss in The Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow), will become the Weaver's Needle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Weaver's_Needle.md', within the main section titled 'Weaver's Needle', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Weaver's Needle Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Weaver's Needle Vessel can be found during The Duskveil fight at the end of the Purple Cloud Mountain secret area in The Webbed Hollow. During the fight, the Blood Stained Needle, which you obtain from Zhu Bajie") (a mandatory boss in The Lower Hollow in The Webbed Hollow), will become the Weaver's Needle.
